import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import linearGradient from"assets/theme/functions/linearGradient";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import boxShadows from"assets/theme/base/boxShadows";// Vision UI Dashboard PRO React Helper Function
import rgba from"assets/theme/functions/rgba";var black=colors.black,gradients=colors.gradients;var card=gradients.card;var borderWidth=borders.borderWidth,borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;var xxl=boxShadows.xxl;export default{styleOverrides:{root:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",background:linearGradient(card.main,card.state,card.deg),backdropFilter:"blur(120px)",position:"relative",padding:"22px",wordWrap:"break-word",backgroundClip:"border-box",border:"".concat(borderWidth[0]," solid ").concat(rgba(black.main,0.125)),borderRadius:borderRadius.xl,boxShadow:xxl}}};
